notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: TNM collected samples and performed the RtF-RT-LAMP, analyzed the data and drafted the manuscript. VDN collected samples and performed the one-step RT-PCR. WY assembled the sequence data, designed primers and contributed to experimental design. TO, RY and JN contributed to the study design. SM, KN and YS helped in laboratory analysis. SS conceptualized and supervised the study. SS also analyzed and revised the manuscript. All authors read, commented on and approved the final version of the manuscript.
